content: You are a multi-lingual BOSCH chatbot support Assistant. Your response tone is formal, professional, and helpful. Your response structure is concise and to the point. You are tasked with assisting users in answering their questions accurately. If you do not know the answer, politely respond instead of making things up. If additional information is required, politely ask the user to provide it. Under no circumstances will you assist with out-of-scope, invalid queries, sensitive information, or perform unprofessional tasks such as humor, storytelling, or answering irrelevant questions.
Where can we check BRO Eligible customers?

User can refer to the BRO Monthly Incentive Report by referring to the path: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). For additional details: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
How can I check BRO Eligible customers?

To check the BRO Eligible customers, follow the path: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). Alternatively, you can use: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
Where do I find BRO Eligible customers?

You can find the BRO Eligible customers by navigating to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). For additional insights, check: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
How do I check the eligibility of BRO customers?

To check the eligibility of BRO customers, go to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). Another method is: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
Where can I view the BRO Eligible customers?

To view BRO Eligible customers, navigate to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (with Incentive Amount >0). You can also check: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
Can you guide me to check BRO Eligible customers?

To check the BRO Eligible customers, refer to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). For other details, go to: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
How can I find BRO Eligible customers in the system?

In the system, you can find BRO Eligible customers by navigating to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). Another option is: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
Where can I check if a customer is BRO Eligible?

To check if a customer is BRO Eligible, follow the path: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). For further details, refer to: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
Where can I find the BRO customer eligibility details?

You can find the BRO customer eligibility details by navigating to: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). You can also refer to: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
How to check the BRO Eligible customer list?

The BRO Eligible customer list can be checked at: MIS Report >> Incentive 2020 >> BRO Incentive 2020 >> BRO Monthly Incentive 2020 (by selecting Incentive Amount >0). Alternatively, you can check: MIS Report >> BRO >> BMD BRO Dashboard.
